data.text: @MrShikharMisra The rain timed it very well Shikhar as had all cleared out by 9 PM for fireworks; did rain in the afternoon and earlier in the evening, possibly could have impacted outdoor BBQs or people at the beach, but we were doing all our celebrating at home, so we did well! 😊👍

data.text: @TealHeather Thank You dear Heather. Wishing you a lovely weekend with pleasant weather. A little cooler for us this morning but will be another hot/humid; some chance of afternoon rain.  We did quite well with rain yesterday and it didn't ruin the fireworks displays; we were able to see some https://t.co/bVGOmEuyHW

@MrShikharMisra Thank you Shikhar. We got a nice view of fireworks through the trees from inside without even having to go out into the crowds. Best way to see them. Rain stopped and the night was clear. 😊👍🎇

data.text: @SIMMO4U That's good Simmo! We're not doing much really; relaxing indoors. Hot/humid out, occasional rumblings of thunder and a spot of rain which we need👍⛈️ Enjoyed veggie burgers for lunch; earlier coffee and donut😊😋 Brian had tea as he's not allowed coffee🥺Love to you and Julia😘

@clairevhill Anyone having a cookout here is getting rained on if they're out in the Open as there's rain falling from the sky.  Predictably; Likely there'll be another rain around fireworks display time. Already stopping; for us it was nice while it lasted as we're sensibly eating indoors.😊
@MrShikharMisra Sounds similar to what we have today Shikhar. Currently 32C at 11 AM - don't have our Noon reading yet. Slight rain chance.

data.text: @TealHeather Thank You dear Heather and Happy Thursday. Sunny and already 80F at 8 AM; hoping for some afternoon rain, but not rain to ruin the BBQs and Fireworks on #FourthOfJuly We'll celebrate quietly at home with some favorite foods and relaxing. Have a Lovely Day. 😊😘 https://t.co/PHhw6Audfy

@MrShikharMisra Thank You Shikhar. Sending Love and Good Wishes from me and Brian. Hope you're getting rain and cooling temps. Another hot day here; we did get some relief yesterday afternoon with a light t/storm and a brief downpour which cooled things but then sun came out and got hot again 😬

data.text:
C'mon Higher Power 
Rain on His Parade
#BoycottTrump4thOfJuly 
#FourthofJuly2019 https://t.co/9UbPmt7DFI
@clairevhill Enjoy your lovely evening at the pub Claire. We're still getting thunder, not sure we'll see much more rain. 😘
@clairevhill We've just had a little thunderstorm with a good downpour that's dropped our temperature down to 27C at 3 PM Claire; so if it stays o/cast and we get more rain that would be lovely 😄⛈️👍

@clairevhill We never know if it will get all the way to us; the percentages aren't particularly high for rain but often that's when we do get some, so not getting my hopes up but also not giving up hope either. 😄🤞⛈️👍

@EvaShadowgirl18 It is hot and we'd love some rain!! I'm sure you'll enjoy the cooler days. That sounds like an interesting read Eva. I'm reading "In the Footsteps of Eve" The Mystery of Human Origins which is a mine of information; I'm also realizing how little I know about the subject 😊

@EvaShadowgirl18 Sounds like a nice day there Eva and you're putting it to good use as always! Lots to do indoors and I'm now going to read until Brian's return. 31C at 10 AM; Mostly Sunny. Slight rain chance late afternoon. Heading up to 33C and not cooling much overnight low is 25C 😔😘😘

@clairevhill @MrShikharMisra Hot start to the morning here Claire; after yesterday's rather steamy walk, I'll keep busy indoors. 🤞the rains will come⛈️ Each day storms not too far away, some severe; here remains largely dry😔Now 27C at 8AM, no breeze. We need rain w/out the severe storms, so keeping 🤞☂️😘 https://t.co/byBfTosMpy

data.text: @clairevhill @MrShikharMisra We have a 40% chance starting Wed, running through to Tuesday; knowing how much the weather enjoys raining out fireworks displays and BBQs, I think you're right Claire, that we should look to Thursday as a good rain day bet! 😁💧
@MrShikharMisra @clairevhill Thanks Shikhar; we appreciate it! Already feeling the positive energy and the love😊👍and 🤞the rain will soon follow! 🌴☂️

data.text: @MrShikharMisra @clairevhill I do hope so Shikhar, but I think most people are more careful with their $100 bills than with their $1 ones💰So happy to hear that you finally got an evening rain and cool weather. Enjoy while it lasts. We're in for a few more of these hot days with minimal rain chances 😣
@Chr1sHall Lovely photo Chris! Nice idea having the little freight wagon behind. I suppose when rain is expected, they cover the freight so it isn't soaked 🤔
@VincentGallag15 The last time I did SSC in the rain was during Hurricane Florence last Sept in Savannah ☔🌀😂 we all got under a covered pavilion, and the show went on!

@clairevhill @MrShikharMisra I'd happily trade temperatures with you today Claire! Our predicted High today is 33C. Best rain chance 15%, which means we won't get any 😣I have cleaning to do indoors and that's where I'll be most of the day now 😀 Started a new Library book so need to get some reading in 😊😘

@TealHeather Happy Tuesday dear Heather. Hope you had a lovely week-end. Hot and mostly dry days here continue. Did get rain Friday afternoon but not much since. Already 83F at 8AM. Walked earlier but no breeze and humid. Have a great week. xx https://t.co/dvTgNrQWwQ

data.text: @MrShikharMisra @clairevhill That's a good sign Shikhar maybe next time those clouds will bring rain down on you! Almost 10 PM here so bedtime soon. No rain today. More hot weather on the way. Not much rain chance before Wednesday 🤞
@clairevhill Delightful little path Claire; and that thistle is impressive. 32C here at Noon. No rain yet. Westerly wind at 9 mph. 🍃🌬️🎐 https://t.co/yVfG0NWREQ

@EvaShadowgirl18 We went weeks w/out rain Eva and relentless heat; had a bit of a break but back to the heat again; every little bit of rain helps. I love your garden and can see that Bron and Bliss enjoy it too. Nice being so near the beach. Guess you can't take the dogs unless you have a car🤔
@MrShikharMisra @clairevhill Thanks Shikhar! Hope your week is going well and there will be rain soon; a really good downpour!! ⛈️🌧️🌦️☔️🌈

@EvaShadowgirl18 It is indeed a lovely and most charming garden and probably just the right size too. Did a short walk of about 30 mins. Appears we had light rain o/night; didn't know until saw damp at the bottom of the carport and puddles over on the Trail. Will be a hot day. Already is 28C 🌞😘

@clairevhill @MrShikharMisra I did a 30 minute walk; was surprised to note we had rain overnight, quite a few puddles on the Levee Trail.  Did hear what sounded like thunder last night but we weren't sure if someone was starting early with the fireworks as happens. Enjoy your lovely day Claire 😊😘
@clairevhill @MrShikharMisra Sounds like a nice day there Claire! especially after the heat 🤞for rain Thursday, without ruining people's BBQs and fireworks displays would also be nice 😁😁

@clairevhill @MrShikharMisra Thanks Claire. Happy New Week; we're already off to a warm start with 27C at 5AM and virtually no rain chance; not even looking very promising all week but like you my bet is on Thursday, Independence Day rain-out for the fireworks and BBQs. Hoping you get rain there Shikhar 🤞 https://t.co/AjB6ynmmaI

@MrShikharMisra @clairevhill Thanks very much Shikhar; it's been a lovely day. Had a really good visit with our friends this afternoon.  No rain today. Best chance now looks like Friday, but that can change. Thursday is Independence Day; often rain likes to spoil the fireworks displays, so it could rain 🎇⛈️

@clairevhill @MrShikharMisra Good part is that your rain dance did bring us a very nice rain Friday afternoon Claire. Also, Shikhar finally got some early morning rain. So I salute the Rain Dance! https://t.co/Q83IDDCdUP

@MrShikharMisra @clairevhill Wonderful Shikhar!😊👍🤞you get more rain ☔️⛈️ Not looking promising for any today and only very little, few light showers here yesterday afternoon. Friends we'll be visiting this afternoon not far from us had a downpour yesterday afternoon, but most of the rain missed us 😔
Beautiful sunset after an afternoon rain today. @ Emerson Point Preserve https://t.co/oNFxAkRo45

View from my office tonight. Forecasted rain for the whole day and night. It rained right after my first gig In between my gigs. Didn’t even get wet loading my gear. The temperature even cooled down a bit. I’d say… https://t.co/Co3xwqN2z3
Spotr 0 miles NNE of FRUITVILLE, FL @ 21:05 UTC Other>-Rain has stopped etc
Rain. What rain? @JordanLaudato @Henderson_FB @stefadams87 @EdOBrien247 @NextGenAACamp #Grinding https://t.co/z6l1fmtBcd
Team Hype Whole squad lit even in the rain! @NextGenAACamp https://t.co/OvwZW44Tkb

data.text:
@Putneyman Definitely not a day for gardening there Dave; I think you have the right idea. #BeerGardenAfternoon ... 🍺🍺🍺 👍

Already 80F here at 11AM and this has been one of our cooler mornings; got some much needed rain yesterday afternoon too! 😊

@clairevhill @MrShikharMisra You sent us the rain Claire and it seems we've made an exchange and sent you the heat; that's not the way it was intended to work🤔 We're enjoying what for us is a cooler day 😊😘

@MrShikharMisra @clairevhill Thanks Shikhar; wishing you and Claire a lovely week-end. We're starting off with a very nice cooler morning with a chance of rain later 🤞⛈️☔️😊👍

* One of my favorites, GIF with cat and coffee and wait for close-up * https://t.co/8VWU0LW6FQ
@MrShikharMisra @clairevhill 🤞Shikhar; the rains will come. We've been through the same waiting. Keep up the rain dance performance too, that seemed to help 😊👍⛈️☔️

@EvaShadowgirl18 Hi Eva, Doing OK thanks. Lovely cooler morning 23C/74F, nicest temperature for weeks; good walk, no mosquitoes after yesterday's rains. Lovely Kasper there for a few days and dogs and all had a great time. Hope you get rain soon. Our high 30C/88F which is cooler than we've had 😘

data.text:
@clairevhill @MrShikharMisra 33c Noontime reading; Mostly Cloudy here Claire. They're now moving an improved rain chance into Friday, so 🤞🤞☂️

* Not at all jealous of your lovely weather * 😊😉 I might find 21c a bit chilly! No! I'd love it!!! As you said, perfection!! 🌞🌞
@MrShikharMisra @clairevhill Thank you Shikhar! Best to you with love from us. Hope you get rain soon; Saturday looking our best chance 🤞☂️

@clairevhill @MrShikharMisra Not hopeful for today Claire; but thanks for the thought. Maybe it's Shikhar's time to get the rain. Saturday afternoon is looking our best bet at the moment 🤞Could get a few drops before then 🙂

data.text: I can see clearly now that the rain is gone #idontmissPAweather @ Siesta Key, Florida https://t.co/GDAAC0SNDE
@MrShikharMisra @clairevhill Hello Shikhar; we need rain too. Claire has all the rain. ☂️⛱️
@clairevhill @MrShikharMisra Shikhar loves the rain Claire. Send him some of yours, you can't keep it all. 😀
@clairevhill There is a good breeze Claire; we'll sit out later. Comfortable indoors right now. Wish we could get some of your rain. Florida would be inhabitable w/out A/C 🐊😬😘

@clairevhill What a lovely idea having a small Summer party and hopefully not spoiled by the rain Claire. I'll be out walking in about 1/2 an hr when it gets light. Now at 6 AM our Temp is 25C, humidity is 94%, it will go down as the temperature goes up. Another dry day. No rain before Wed😘
